SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() local num_creatures = filter:Count() local power = 0
while (num_creatures > 0) do power = power + 1 filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:SetPowerMin(power) filter:NotTargetted() num_creatures = filter:Count() end
power = power - 1
if power > 0 then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "TOKEN_SAPROLING_1_1_332484", power, EffectController() ) end
